sn45.127:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.127:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn45.127:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn45.127:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam.
sn45.127:1.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
